EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.Denver Reminder with Banner
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Monday at SpringOne Tour
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you Monday at SpringOne Tour Denver <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/denver?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-denver-q218]]>. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions. Please be sure to bring your ID with you when you check in.
Monday, May 14 - Day 1 Agenda

8:00 am

5:30 pm
Social & Networking at Fire Resturant at the Art Hotel <[[https://www.thearthotel.com/dine-drink/fire]]>

Location History Colorado Center 1200 N Broadway Denver, CO 80203
Parking Info: Judicial Garage - 1255 Broadway which is adjacent to the museum The Cultural Center Garage - 12th Avenue on the west side of Broadway
We look forward to seeing you on Monday!
Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
